subject: Football (College)
Lobbying and Lobbyists
Playoff Games
Bowl Games
Rose Bowl (Football Game)
Sugar Bowl
lead_paragraph: No one believes that the 12 experts who will determine the four teams for the College Football Playoff can be bought, but some think a little old-fashioned lobbying could not hurt.
snippet: No one believes that the 12 experts who will determine the four teams for the College Football Playoff can be bought, but some think a little old-fashioned lobbying could not hurt.
